answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Nyonya Ani dan Livy akan ke pasar. Mereka sedang membeli 3 kilo telur, 2 botol madu, beberapa buah dan beberapa susu. Livy menaruh barang-barang itu ke dalam tas belanja. Nyonya Ani membayar pembelian di konter kasir. Lalu mereka pulang ke rumah dengan naik mobil.

1. Apa yang akan mereka beli?

C. madu

2. Apakah mereka membeli sekilo telur?

B. No, they aren't

3. Di mana Livy meletakkan barang belanjaan?

C. Shopping bag

//Soal Selanjutnya tanpa terkait dengan teks di atas

4. Rendy selalu makan ... di pagi hari.

a. Bread/Roti

5. Renata haus. Dia butuh....

D. Air segar/fresh water

6. Lihat gambar!!

apa itu?

B. itu adalah bubur

7. Jack: ....

Clara: Makanan kesukaanku adalah bakso. Bakso sangat enak.

C. what is your favorite food? (Si Jack bertanya sebab Clara memberikan pernyataan jawaban)

8. Makanan ini rasanya sangat manis. Semut-semut suka memakannya. Itu adalah....

d. Candy / permen.

9. ini adalah makanan favorit tikus. ini adalah....

C. cheese/Keju

10. Devina sedang makan sepiring ..... untuk makan pagi.

a. fried rice/ nasi goreng

11. Rendy suka makanan itu. itu adalah....

b. telur mata sapi/ sunny side up

12. cuaca panas hari ini. Aku butuh sebotol ....

c. jus jeruk/orange Juice

13. warna dari minuman ini adalah hijau. Rasanya manis. Minuman ini adalah....

D. avocado juice/jus alpukat

14. Ibuku sedang memasak semangkuk bubur. Itu terdiri dari....

a. rice and vegetables/Nasi dan sayur-mayur

15. Bntuknya seperti payung. Itu adalah....

b. permen/candy

Semoga bermanfaat. Silakan ditanyakan apabila bingung. Thanks!

related_questions.question:
5. Complete the table with the comparative and     superlative form
No. Adjectives Comparative Superlative
1. high
2. low
3.
thin
4.
interesting
5.
expensive​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

1. high (adjective)

higher (comparative)

highest (superlative)

2. low (adjective)

lower (comparative)

lowest (superlative)

3. thin (adjective)

thinner (comparative)

thinnest (superlative)

4. interesting (adjective)

more interesting (comparative)

most interesting (superlative)

5. expensive (adjective)

more expensive (comparative)

most expensive (superlative)

related_questions.question: Contoh paragraf dalam kalimat-kalimat yang bentuk present perfect tense​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Today is 16th August and tomorrow is my sister’s birthday. Her name is Kristal. I want to give her a surprise. I have talked to some of her friends. They have helped me to prepare a surprising party. We have discussed it since July.

We are going to celebrate my sister’s birthday in a small restaurant near my house. Our parents have also agreed it. The restaurant has been booked by our parents.

What about the birthday present? No worries, I have prepared it too. She loves art very much. I have made a painting for her. I hope she will like it. But I haven’t wrapped the painting because it hasn’t dried yet.

Have you ever celebrated someone’s birthday?

Jawaban:

4. c. sits

5. c. travel agent

6. d. continents

Penjelasan:

4. Jawabannya c. sits karena kalimat menggunakan bentuk Simple Present Tense.

5. Jawabannya c. travel agent karena di airport ramai, sesuai menurut teks.

6. Indonesia terletak di antara dua benua (continents), yaitu benua Asia dan Australia.

Semoga membantu ya.
